name: hebraic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the Jewish people, especially the Jews of ancient Israel, and to Judaism (= their religion): We study the influence of Egypt on Hebraic and Greek religious thought. Hebraic studies
related to the ancient or modern Hebrew language: Yiddish has Hebraic, Germanic, and Slavic elements. Hebraic characters See
Hebrew
More examplesFewer examplesThere are both Hebraic and Church rituals of cleansing after childbirth.He still follows the Hebraic faith.They refer to Christianity's "Hebraic roots". The cloth was printed with the five Hebraic characters for "mazeltov". Yahweh is the Hebraic name of God.
